The toolkit contains copyrighted software that is licensed under one or more open source licenses.
These licenses and corresponding source code for the open source packages included in this toolkit can be located at their respective web sites shown below.

You may alternately obtain complete Corresponding Source by contacting
Rockwell Automation via our Contact form on the Rockwell Automation website:
http://www.rockwellautomation.com/global/about-us/contact/contact.page.
Please include "Open Source" as part of the request text.

The software contains the following open source packages:
- the package rapidjson, available at http://rapidjson.org/, is licensed under MIT, JSON,
  the text of which is available at https://github.com/Tencent/rapidjson/blob/master/license.txt
  
- the package log4cxx, available at https://logging.apache.org/log4cxx/latest_stable/index.html, is licensed under Apache 2.0,
  the text of which is available at https://logging.apache.org/log4cxx/latest_stable/license.html

- the package zmq available at http://zeromq.org/, is licensed under LGPLv3,
  the text of which is available at https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/blob/master/COPYING.LESSER
